title: F/S T206 HOF, SL'er and Common - All Graded **ALL SOLD** THANK YOU!

posts.post_title: F/S T206 HOF, SL'er and Common - All Graded **ALL SOLD** THANK YOU!
posts.post_content:
For Sale:  T206s - all new to BST (don't think I've listed these before) - most just got back from PSA.  HOF, SLer and Common.  All Graded - dupes from set.  All prices are delivered, PayPal (payment owed) check or MO.  PM, Post or Email - first.  Thank you!

* Ed Greminger, Pied 350, PSA4 - $145 **SOLD**
* Elmer Flick, SOV 350, PSA3 - $125 (nice card, no creases) **SOLD**
* Johnny Evers (Chicago w/Bat) - SC350 - PSA2.5 - $120 (I don't get this grade at all - no creases, gorgeous card) **SOLD**
* Charlie Fritz, OM - BVG2.5 - $65 (small paper chip near mouth) **SALE PEND**
* Johnny Kling, Pied 150, PSA2 - $32 (Beautiful card front & back, corner crease in lower left is only flaw) **SALE PEND**
* Bill O'Hara, SC350 - PSA3 - $40 (no crease) **SOLD**
* Rube Dessau, Pied 350 - PSA4 - $50 **SOLD**
* Eddie Collins, Pied 350 - PSA2 - $90 (this is another one I don't get - no creases - "u" in Quality on back has faint paper loss) **SOLD**

Ed. I'll take the Flick, Evers & Collins cards.

         Thank you,

i'll take the frenchman:D
* Rube Dessau, Pied 350 - PSA4 - $50
I'll take the Kling and Fritz
